mean_cn: n.电子学；电子设备，电子产品；电子工业
mean_en: the branch of science and technology that studies electric currents in electronic equipment; the use of electronic technology, especially in developing new equipment
sentence: I studied electronics at university and can now fix this computer with ease.
sentence_trans: 我大学学的是电子学，现在我可以很容易地修好这台电脑。
word_etyma: electr电的 ＋ on构成物理学名词 ＋ ics表名称，学科学术 → electronics电子学
